description: Control the camera view of a plot. If no plot name is specified, the current view is assumed. The camera always points from the eye position to the view center.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Plot name. If not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: center
keywords.description: The center of the view (look-at point). The camera always points from the eye position to the view center. In model mode (default), the eye rotates around this center when the view is rotated.

keywords.name: clip-back
keywords.description: Limiting distance to the back clipping plane. Default is 1e10 (no constraint). Adjust to improve depth buffer resolution for distant objects.

keywords.name: clip-front
keywords.description: Limiting distance to the front clipping plane. Default is -1e10 (no constraint). Adjust to improve depth buffer resolution for close objects.

keywords.name: dip
keywords.description: Set view plane orientation by dip angle in degrees. Eye is rotated about the center while keeping center and distance constant.

keywords.name: dip-direction
keywords.description: Set view plane orientation by dip direction in degrees. Eye is rotated about the center while keeping center and distance constant.

keywords.name: distance
keywords.description: Distance from eye to view center. The view direction is held constant, but eye is moved to achieve this distance.

keywords.name: eye
keywords.description: Set the camera eye position. Viewing direction is always from eye to view center. The 'up' direction is determined by current roll.

keywords.name: isometric
keywords.description: Reset to isometric view. Equivalent to keystroke [I].

keywords.name: magnification
keywords.description: Set view magnification (zoom). Default is 1.0 (45 degree field of view). Increasing magnification decreases field of view angle.

keywords.name: projection
keywords.description: Set projection mode: 'parallel' for orthographic projection (objects don't get smaller with distance), 'perspective' for perspective view based on eye position (default).

keywords.name: reset
keywords.description: Reset view settings to defaults and recalculate initial view. Plot items are not changed. Equivalent to keystroke Shift+[R].

keywords.name: roll
keywords.description: Set camera roll angle in degrees. Roll defines which direction is towards the top of the screen. Measured from screen-top vector to global z direction projected onto screen.

keywords.name: rotation
keywords.description: Rotate view by vector v where: first component is yaw angle, second is pitch angle, third is roll angle.

examples.description: Reset current plot to isometric view
Set both center and eye position for plot 'myplot'

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot view <keyword> <value>') - no direct Python SDK method
